examples.korean: He emphasized how little was known about the disease. 발음듣기 그는 그 질병에 관해 알려진 것이 얼마나 적은지를 강조했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He emphasized how little was known about the disease. 발음

examples.korean: Nothing is known about her parentage and background. 발음듣기 그녀의 혈통과 출신 배경에 대해서는 아무것도 알려진 게 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Nothing is known about her parentage and background. 발음

examples.korean: her best-known poem 발음듣기 그녀의 (시 중에서) 가장 잘 알려진 시 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
the scene of the purported crime 발음듣기 그 범행 현장이라고 알려진 곳 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the scene of the purported crime 발음

examples.korean: Little is known of the youngest son; it is presumed that he died young. 발음듣기 (그들의) 막내아들에 대해서는 알려진 것이 거의 없다. 어려서 죽은 것으로 추정된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Little is known of the youngest son; it is presumed that he died young. 발음
